question: Hoollongapar Gibbon Sanctuary which is home to only ape in India, the hoolock gibbon is lcoated in which of the following state?
explanation: The Hoollongapar Gibbon Sanctuary is located in the state of Assam. It is an isolated protected area of evergreen forest. It was officially constituted in 1997. It is home to only ape in India, the hoolock gibbon.
